metadata.title: CVE-2018-8005 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When there are multiple ranges in a range request, Apache Traffic Server(ATS) will read the entire object from cache. This can cause performanceproblems with large objects in cache. This affects versions 6.0.0 to 6.2.2and 7.0.0 to 7.1.3. To resolve this issue users running 6.x users shouldupgrade to 6.2.3 or later versions and 7.x users should upgrade to 7.1.4 orlater versions.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
